Params: {1: '1', 3: 'Lucia rushes out of camp and into the fluttering snow...'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "Babylonia... The future... Food... Living... Everything's... pointless...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Ahead of Lucia, a Corrupted slowly shambles toward her.'}
{3: 'But this time, Lucia does not raise her knife.'}
{3: 'Lucia pays no attention to the man. Or perhaps, she is no longer paying attention to anything.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'I hate you... I hate... this world...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: 'The source of all your pain comes from the Punishing Virus.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'I have no more reason to fight...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nikola', 3: 'You must live. Because this is what Luna would have wanted.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nikola', 3: 'Point your blade at whatever, whoever you want.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: "But, don't let Luna's sacrifice be for nothing.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Lucia picks up the blade in front of her at the last moment, and charges toward the Corrupted...'}
{2: 'Researcher', 3: 'Adapting well to Tantalum-193. No adverse reactions.'}
{2: 'Researcher', 3: 'Okay, cut off external circulation and prepare for Inver-Device installation.'}
{2: 'Researcher', 3: 'Consciousness Lucia, are you ready for this?'}
{3: 'The broadcast within the surgery room turned on.'}
{3: 'Nikola crossed his hands, looking intently at Lucia upon the surgery table through the screen.'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: "You've never truly lived your life before..."}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: "If you're meant to go up in flame... then I will not put your fire to waste."}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: 'From today on, you will become the ember that blazes... that fades along with humanity, no matter... if you truly believe in it or not...'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: 'Take us there, Lucia—to the end of this darkness.'}
